DOC.brief_summary: The purpose is to determine the effect of SLx-2101 dosed at 5mg or 10mg for 14 days on systolic, diastolic pressures and heart rate in patients with hypertension.
DOC.brief_title: Safety and Effect of Oral Doses of 5mg or 10mg of SLx-2101 for 14 Days in Patients With Hypertension
DOC.detailed_description: 1. Placebo-corrected supine peripheral systolic, diastolic blood pressures and heart rate 2. 24 hour ambulatory blood pressure and heart rate 3. Safety and tolerability
DOC.criteria: Male or female subjects between 18 and 70 years old, inclusive Moderate to severe hypertension Body weight within a body mass index of 1832kg/m2 The subject is receiving more than three antihypertensive agents A history of drug abuse Exposure to a new chemical entity within 3 months prior to the first day of dosing
